item.title: Using the .cfg's in my server...?
item.dc:creator: @redsox3334 redsox3334
item.description:
@redsox3334 wrote:

Okayyyyy, so I’m using Winterlove v3 as a source, and it is completely bare, except for a few custom commands of mine. I’m new to server development, and I cannot figure out how to load autospawn and the other cfgs into my server. I’ve looked around, but nothing has helped. I have all the files in a folder called CFG, and in one of the files, NPCHandler.java, there is this code:

NPCHandler() { for(int i = 0; i < maxNPCs; i++) { npcs[i] = null; } for(int i = 0; i < maxListedNPCs; i++) { NpcList[i] = null; } loadNPCList("npc.cfg"); loadAutoSpawn("autospawn.cfg"); }

I would think that would work, but it just…doesn’t.

I may have missed something in the forums here, so it would be great if someone could push me in the right direction.

-Redsox3334

PS: My server is currently called …Scape and is not online. If you could submit a title, and I use it, you can be a mod when you join!(There will be three mods: Me, my brother, and whoever gives the best title)

Read full topic
